listing_company_name: New Tweed Coast Real Estate Group - KINGSCLIFF
description:
Quality, on-trend renovations influenced by modernist European design depicts this highly detailed single-level family home in the desirable creekside enclave of Kingscliff Hill.

Its impressive visual aesthetic of geometric forms, neutral palettes and organic materials is equally matched by a functional floor plan, lifestyle appointments and connectivity with the outdoors.

A custom arched oak front door makes for a visually dynamic entrance to the residence of white brick, vertical battens, Oslo stone and cascading gardens.

Considered interiors of Otsumigaki clay plastered feature walls, travertine cobbles and curved portals deliver modern yet timeless appeal to the 246m2 floor plan.

Wide European oak floorboards imbue warmth to the light-filled open lifestyle space comprising a generous living room, dining area and designer kitchen appointed a butler’s pantry, custom island dining bar, stone benchtops, 900mm gas cooktop, two dishwashers and soft-close cabinetry.

Gliding glass ensures seamless connectivity with the vast sun deck with space for open-air alfresco dining. It wraps around the saltwater plunge pool and overlooks the integrated stone fire pit with custom curved bench seating ahead of manicured lawns and mature olive trees.

Sheer window dressings soften the privately winged master bedroom detailed with circular wall sconces, a dressing room, and deluxe ensuite with a double vanity, twin shower and arced mirrors.

There are three dedicated guest bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, two main bathrooms, and the convenience of two multi-purpose rooms with outdoor access suitably placed for use as additional bedrooms, a home office, yoga studio, games room, media lounge or rumpus room.

Additional conveniences include a mudroom-inspired travertine foyer, wireless security, air conditioning, oversized Velux skylights, and new quality Bradnam windows and doors. Positioned just metres from Cudgen Creek in a quiet address, this immaculate, low-maintenance and newly renovated residence is just a short walk from schools, shops and the beach.

- Level block in quiet street edging Cudgen Creek
- Newly renovated, single-level residence of 246m2
- Saltwater plunge pool, vast sun deck, integrated fire pit
- Open lifestyle space; custom kitchen has butler’s pantry
- Master bedroom with dressing room and couples ensuite
- Two multi-purpose rooms, mudroom, double carport
